TEXT.S: Donald John Trump I 1946 a miheca saka 6 folad saka 14 a romi'ad masofoc ci Donald John Trump, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Puerto rico, United states anini i ci Donald John Trump, patirengan a romi'ad i 2017 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 20 a romi'ad. Pimmanaw ni Obama iti opisinana idi Enero 20, 2021.
